name: SystolicBloodPressureLessThan140
title: Systolic Blood Pressure Less Than 140
description: Name change from "Systolic BP <140 Most Recent, G8752". Value set includes CPT Level II codes and active & inactive HCPCS codes that capture systolic blood < 140.   Can also includes codes that represent diastolic blood pressure < 130 or 130-139.
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: Most recent systolic blood pressure < 140),(Data Element Scope: Representative systolic blood pressure < 90
 systolic blood pressure < 140),(Inclusion Criteria: HCPCS codes that represent only a systolic blood pressure < 140),(Exclusion Criteria: Diastolic blood pressure codes, codes that represent both a systolic and diastolic reading)
